name: Rotisserie Chicken
author: Nicole Baloh Korte
summary: This is a great easy recipe that our family loves.  It's perfect as the main dish of a simple meal with French fries and cole slaw.
directions: Season the inside of the chicken with a pinch of salt
Place the chicken onto a rotisserie and set the grill on high
During that time, quickly mix together the butter, 1 tablespoon of salt, paprika and pepper
Turn the grill down to medium and baste the chicken with the butter mixture
Close the lid and cook for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, basting occasionally, until the internal temperature reaches 180 degrees F (83 degrees C) when taken in the thigh with a meat thermometer
Remove from the rotisserie and let stand for 10 to 15 minutes before cutting into pieces and serving
